Address.label: Address
Address.value: 500 DALLAS STREET,SUITE 1700, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Amplify Energy Corp is an independent oil and natural gas company engaged in the acquisition, development, exploitation, and production of oil and natural gas properties in the United States. Its properties consist of mature, legacy oil and natural gas fields. The assets primarily consist of producing oil and natural gas properties located in Oklahoma, the Rockies, federal waters offshore Southern California, East Texas/North Louisiana, and Eagle Ford.

value.name: Daniel Furbee
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
